text: For example, Biden praised Strom Thurmond at his retirement as did lots of other Democratic senators. It's a Senate tradition and kind of quotidian in nature, until now. Biden makes it clear Thurmond was an ideological foe but also salutes his stamina for the longest filibuster/6
